### anova

```{r}

```

```{r}
m2 <- lm(duration ~ education_grouped + y, data=df)
```

```{r}
m3 <- lm(duration~education_grouped + y + age, data=df)
```

```{r}
anova(m1, m2)
```

```{r}
anova(m2, m3)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
modelo <- update(modelo, .~. -periodico)
summary(modelo)
```

```{r}

summary(modelo_interaccion)
```

### Regresió logística


```{r}
# First separate train and test
# 80% train sample and 20% test sample
llwork <- sample(1:nrow(df),round(0.80*nrow(df),0))

dfall<-df
df_train <- dfall[llwork,]
df_test <-dfall[-llwork,]
```

```{r}
m0 <- glm(y~ 0, family="binomial", data=df_train)
summary(m0)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE}
?glm()

m1<-glm(y ~ duration + campaign + previous,family="binomial",data=df_train)
summary(m1)
vif(m1)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
residualPlots(m1,id=list(method=cooks.distance(m1),n=10))
marginalModelPlots(m1)
avPlots(m1,id=list(method=cooks.distance(m1),n=5))
crPlots(m1,id=list(method=cooks.distance(m1),n=5))
```


### Validation

```{r}
library(ResourceSelection)
pred_test <- predict(m1, newdata=df_test, type="response")
# ht <- hoslem.test(df_test$Audi, pred_test)
# ht
#cbind(ht$observed, ht$expected)
# ROC Curve

library("ROCR")
library("AUC")

dadesroc<-prediction(pred_test,df_test$y)
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
performance(dadesroc,"auc",fpr.stop=0.05)
plot(performance(dadesroc,"err"))
plot(performance(dadesroc,"tpr","fpr"))
abline(0,1,lty=2)
roc(pred_test,df_test$y)

```


```{r}
# Confusion Table Analysis
y.est <- ifelse(pred_test<0.5,"no","yes")
tt<-table(y.est,df_test$y)
tt
100*sum(diag(tt))/sum(tt)
```
